comments: worst teacher i ever had. disengaged, unresponsive, unclear. added NO value to online class for $2K+. avoid at ALL costs. you might as well teach yourself.

Gives TERRIBLE lectures! She basically is just reading someone else\'s powerpoints. She gives incorrect science information - even in her specialty. She always ended class early and assignments rarely made complete sense. It was annoying to pay so much for a class taught by this professor!

class is really boring and i think the TAs are much nicer and helpful than her. must buy a new , expensive textbook since she makes you tear off the pages in the textbook!! exams are ok if you study her notes.

Very boring lectures. She reads off of the powerpoint slides and there is no need to go to the lectures. When it\'s time for test review she gets very cranky. The TA\'s are very helpful. The labs are easy but a waste of time. I wouldn\'t recommend this class. Take another NATS if you can.
not my favorite professor, but her tests were straight forward from her reviews. She never tested on reading either which was a plus.
Not very accessible for questions, but does a good job with lecture and allowing questions during class. There are 2 TA\'s that can answer questions. Overall, a good teacher and an average class.

She was nice at first and then she just got meaner and meaner and meaner as the course went on. I would recommend NOT taking one of her classes. She tells you one thing and then denies it later so she\'s a bit of a liar. No very helpful and she gets pissed off a lot. Overall, she is a bad professor. Stay away unless you like mean people.
